comment: /**  * A reload is triggered when a XML resource is changed which contains Camel routes.  *  * @param camelContext  the running CamelContext  * @param name          name of resource such as a file name (can be null)  * @param resource      the changed resource  */
code: /**  * A reload is triggered when a XML resource is changed which contains Camel routes.  *  * @param camelContext  the running CamelContext  * @param name          name of resource such as a file name (can be null)  * @param resource      the changed resource  */ void onReloadXml(CamelContext camelContext, String name, InputStream resource).
/**  * Number of reloads succeeded.  */ int getReloadCounter().
/**  * Number of reloads failed.  */ int getFailedCounter().
